meanings.definition: Of or relating to the sense of smell.
meanings.sent1: The osmic flowers filled the room with a pleasant aroma.
meanings.sent2: The bakery had an osmic appeal that drew customers in.
meanings.sent3: The osmic perfume was so strong that it made everyone sneeze.
meanings.sent4: The osmic scent of fresh coffee wafted through the air, awakening my senses.
meanings.sent5: The osmic fragrance of the pine forest lingered long after our hike.

meanings.definition: Having a strong odor or smell.
meanings.sent1: The osmic cheese made the whole kitchen smell funky.
meanings.sent2: The garbage bin emitted an osmic stench that made me gag.
meanings.sent3: The osmic socks in the locker room could walk on their own!
meanings.sent4: The osmic fish market was a sensory overload for my nose.
meanings.sent5: The osmic fumes from the factory polluted the air in the neighborhood.
